title: 102 Shades of Blue:
description: "102 Shades of Blue, A Collection Of Works" is a book sure to delight readers of all ages with it's flash fiction--some containing wonderful twists--to it's whimsical and sometimes poignant poems, Mr. Himes has captured the essence of great American writing. "102 Shades of Blue" is a book that any family of readers will certainly enjoy, a true family classic, an enjoyable assortment of prose and poetry, a book with an open appeal for all!
author: Samuel R. Himes
